title: Will You Get The Microchip Implant? - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/17/17
itunes:title: Will You Get The Microchip Implant? - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/17/17
description:
George Noory and privacy expert Liz McIntyre discuss the push by companies to have their employees get microchip impants, and whether those tracking devices are actually the biblical sign of the beast from the Book of Revelation.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
